Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:

src/serial/zsc-src/finaldump.f [code]Save relevant data at the end of the simulation run to file 'final.out'

src/serial/zsc-src/main.f [code]Driver for the D2Q5/D2Q9 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM
src/serial/zsc-src/memalloc.f [code]Allocate (FLAG == 1) or deallocate (FLAG != 1) memory for common arrays
src/serial/zsc-src/parameters.f [code]Read input parameters and define simulation constants
src/serial/zsc-src/stats.f [code]Calculate intermediate simulation results and save to file 'stats.out'
src/serial/zsc-src/stream.f [code]Relaxation and streaming steps for the distribution function f
